title: Launched
description: An NPM package to make any website editable. It enables freelance clients to modify their websites with zero codebase access or programming experience necessary.

title: Vars Frontend
description: Competitive 1v1 coding website. Built and designed the entire frontend and integrated with backend.

title: Quilli
description: A document creation tool made to improve the poetry writing workflow. My introduction to ReactJS and my first fullstack project.

title: Word Flip
description: A gamepidgeon-inspired word game. My first fullstack project, complete with auth and online play. The website is no longer up, but the chrome extension is.

title: PagePal
description: A web app that generates quizzes about a book's content. Developed in three days for TechOptimum Hacks 2023, receiving 4th place in the advanced pool.

title: Lexily
description: A web app that assesses a reading levels through adaptive testing. Developed in five days for DualHacks 2023, receiving 5th place in the advanced pool.

title: CSHS AI Demo
description: A flappy bird clone controleld by hand gestures. Made in ~2 hours for a computer science event at a local elementary school.

title: Github README Stats
description: A serverless API for dynamically generating github language stats.

title: Bean Counter
description: A simple webb app for keeping count of day-to-day tasks. Made for my dad, who wanted to track his water intake.

title: Theme Palette Generator
description: A website that generates a color palette from a theme using the singleton pattern.

title: Perceptify App
description: A centralized dashboard for Perceptify, featuring auth, data aggregation, and user management.

title: Perceptify Website
description: A promotional website for Perceptify. A complete rehaul of the original site's branding and design.

title: Codin Frontend
description: A site for creating and sharing tech projects. Built out the entire frontend and integrated with the backend.

title: Launched Docs
description: Documentation for the Launched NPM package. My first time using Docusaurus with MDX.

title: Launch Website
description: The official website for Launch.

title: Launch Dashboard
description: A dashboard for Launch clients, complete with analytics, realtime chatting, and website editing.

title: The World Debates
description: A promotional website for The World Debates, a debating organization for high schoolers.

title: CVE
description: A promotional website for Central Valley Endocrinology, a medical practice in California.

title: Blank Page
description: A promotional website for Blank Page, a non-profit tech organization based in India.

title: Code Connect Website
description: The official website for Code Connect.

title: Boids
description: A simple simulation of bird flocking behavior made in processing.
